name: aileen
cooked: The Open Source Hardware Association is taking input on the proposal for an open hardware certification in this forum. This thread is devoted to question # 8, which reads: “Should OSHWA maintain a public database of certification complaints and how those complaints were addressed? If so, should the entire process be public or should there be a grace period for private resolution?” For other question forums, as well as a general comment forum, click [here].
raw: The Open Source Hardware Association is taking input on the proposal for an open hardware certification in this forum. If so, should the entire process be public or should there be a grace period for private resolution?" For other question forums, as well as a general comment forum, click [here].
